item.description:
"Making the most of the changes in our industry":
Marketing guru and NY agency veteran, John Follis, offers ideas on how to embrace new technologies as part of your creative process. Whether you're a writer, photographer or designer, learn how the changes in our industry provide alternative and exciting opportunities.

John Follis spent 25-years on Madison Avenue as an award-winning creative, and then, as co-founder of an award-winning ad agency. More recently, John has become a respected national authority on Social Media and Web 2.0 marketing.

A featured speaker at Chicago's Social Media 2007 John also writes on the topic for ADWEEK. And, for the past two years, John has hosted a podcast: The Marketing Show with John Follis and blog: The Follis Marketing Report.

And if you're a business owner seeking a cost-effective strategy for maximum sales results, ask John about his "Marketing Therapy" program, or look it up online at www.follisinc.com.
